channel.title: Help?
channel.description: we'll i know how to create a p server and everything but im just wondering how do i make it downloadable for people to play on and not just me. Also how come when i radomley talk i don't have a gold crown next to my name like all owners do???

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @beastlytom beastlytom
item.description:
@beastlytom wrote:

i know portforwarding from starcraft but i still dont get how when i download a server and what not i cant do they commands.

Read full topic

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

hitman2009:

Compress your server’s client and then upload it to a site such as uppit.com or mediafire. To let others play you have to forward your port(pretty much opening your router to others), go to www.portforward.com and it’ll tell you how to portforward. Then go to no-ip.org and make an account, then download the no-ip client and add a domain such as Servername.no-ip.biz then run your server and others should be able to connect

To be honest, if he doesn’t know how to do that he probably has no clue how to follow the portforwarding directions or how to compress the client. Not to be offensive or mean, just sayin’

Read full topic
